pages.privacy-policy: CrystalPalace - Privacy Policy CrystalPalace HOME ABOUT US Casino Contact Privacy Policy Introduction Welcome to the Privacy Policy of CrystalPalace. Your privacy is paramount to us. This policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your information when you visit our website crystalpalace.com, utilize our services, or engage with us in other capacities. Information We Collect We may gather personal information such as your name, email address, phone number, and payment details when you make reservations or interact with our services. How We Use Your Information We utilize collected information to process reservations, enhance our services, communicate with you, and deliver personalized experiences. Sharing Your Information We do not sell, trade, or otherwise disclose your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as specified in this policy. Security of Your Information We implement security measures to safeguard your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is entirely secure. Your Rights You possess the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. Additionally, you may withdraw consent to processing or object to specific uses of your information. Changes to This Policy We may revise this Privacy Policy periodically. We will notify you of any changes by posting the updated policy on this page. Welcome to the CrystalPalace website! pages.terms-conditions: CrystalPalace - Terms and Conditions CrystalPalace HOME ABOUT US Casino Contact Terms and Conditions Introduction Welcome to the Terms and Conditions of CrystalPalace. These terms govern your use of our website crystalpalace.com and our services. By accessing or using our website and services, you agree to adhere to these terms. Reservations All reservations are subject to availability. CrystalPalace reserves the right to cancel or modify reservations that violate our policies or terms. Payment and Fees You agree to pay all fees and charges incurred in connection with your reservations and use of our services. Payments are securely processed through our payment gateway. Guest Responsibilities Guests are responsible for their conduct during their stay at CrystalPalace. We expect all guests to adhere to our policies, respect our staff, and consider other guests. Limitation of Liability CrystalPalace shall not be liable for any damages, losses, or injuries incurred during your stay or use of our services, except where required by law. Changes to Terms We reserve the right to update these Terms and Conditions periodically. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting the updated terms on this page.
